title: CVE-2025-53760 Microsoft SharePoint Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
description: Server-side request forgery (ssrf) in Microsoft Office SharePoint allows an authorized attacker to elevate privileges over a network.

title: CVE-2025-53771 Microsoft SharePoint Server Spoofing Vulnerability
